name: Squish Squad
description:
Squish Squad is an entry for the Stay Safe Jam, in which the theme is solidarity.

Command a team of peculiar blobby creatures called “squishes.” Your squishes will need to work together to solve puzzles and fight enemies. No squish is good enough on its own, and no squish gets left behind!

If you enjoy this very small taste of Squish Squad, let me know and feel free to share your ideas! I may continue the project in the future.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Hold the left mouse button to aim and throw your squishes
